resources.string: Click the button to add an entry to the baby feed log.
If you\'ve found this app useful please consider rating it in the Google Play store.\n\nThank you very much! :)

This app is just to aid in feeding the baby, it should never be the only thing relied upon.

Always listen to your doctor on how and when to feed your baby.

I take no responsibility for your use of this app.

The baby in the logo was created by divide by zero and can be found at http://fonts.tom7.com/.

Some icons were created by the cool folks at http://www.androidicons.com/.

This app was made when I had my baby boy (late January, 2013). I wanted to keep track of when he was being fed and I soon realized that it would be nice to have the phone remind me three hours after every meal.

And thus, the idea for this app was born.

I hope it helps you out too! :) /Mike
